items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset or data structure within a dataset.

title: Dataset of species summary records from the IUCN Red List
description: A dataset containing summary records pulled from querying the IUCN Red List API. Items can indicate a negative search result. Contains a mix of higher level standard properties and custom properties. Data were assembled using a search function build into the experimental bispy software package (https://github.com/usgs-bcb/bispy).

Name Source.title: Source of a name used as a parameter
Name Source.description: A string denoting the source for the scientific name used in the IUCN Red List search. Useful for determining the provenance of the name used.

iucn_species_summary.title: IUCN Red List Species Summary Container
iucn_species_summary.description: This container houses the summarized results for an IUCN Red List species when the species was found. Otherwise, it will be empty or not present.

iucn_taxonid.title: The numeric IUCN taxon ID
iucn_taxonid.description: The internal taxon identifier used in the IUCN Red List system. Used together with a secondary identifier to create a resolvable reference and as a key identifier through the IUCN Red List API.

iucn_status_code.title: The IUCN Conservation Status Code
iucn_status_code.description: The conservation status code for a species (ref: https://www.iucnredlist.org/resources/categories-and-criteria)

iucn_status_name.title: IUCN Status Name
iucn_status_name.description: The full name of the IUCN Red List Status (ref: https://www.iucnredlist.org/resources/categories-and-criteria).

iucn_population_trend.title: IUCN Red List Population Trend
iucn_population_trend.description: A categorical string indicating the overall trend for the population of a species.

iucn_secondary_identifier.title: A secondary identifier for a species record in the IUCN Red List
iucn_secondary_identifier.description: Secondary identifier extracted from a species citation string and used to generate a resolvable identifier.
